name: Guardians
detailed_description:
Steam Video

This content is only available in an online streaming format. More information about streaming videos can be found in the Streaming Videos on Steam FAQ.


About the Video

During the Cold War, a Soviet organization called "Patriot" created an elite team of superheroes. For years, these heroes hid in the shadows, but now they must emerge to defend Mother Russia.
about_the_game: During the Cold War, a Soviet organization called "Patriot" created an elite team of superheroes. For years, these heroes hid in the shadows, but now they must emerge to defend Mother Russia.
short_description: During the Cold War, a Soviet organization called "Patriot" created an elite team of superheroes. For years, these heroes hid in the shadows, but now they must emerge to defend Mother Russia.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 or AMD equivalent
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Network Bandwidth of 5Mbps for 540p, 3Mbps for 360p.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core I3+ or AMD equivalent recommended for HD 1080p playback
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Network Bandwidth of 12Mbps for 1080p or 8Mbps for 720p.

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OSX 10.7
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 or AMD equivalent
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Network Bandwidth of 5Mbps for 540p, 3Mbps for 360p.

  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Linux Ubuntu 12.04 or later, SteamOS 2.20 or later
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 or AMD equivalent
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Network Bandwidth of 5Mbps for 540p, 3Mbps for 360p.

  • Processor: Intel Core I3+ or AMD equivalent recommended for HD 1080p playback
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Network Bandwidth of 12Mbps for 1080p or 8Mbps for 720p.
